summary: Adds a craftable Flute and Lute that you can actually play. By play, I mean that pressing a button will play a note, pressing a different button will play a different note. Requires SKSE.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a craftable Flute and Lute that you can actually play. By play, I mean that pressing a button will play a note, pressing a different button will play a different note. The drum sounds you play are from skyrim and aren't interactive. Requires SKSE. 

Bring a flute, lute, or drum to the forge. Craft the playable instruments under miscellaneous. 

[center]﻿[/center][youtube]xfMGI2btRBc[/youtube]

[center]####################
[b]How to Play the Flute[/b]
####################[/center]
[list][*]Press A, Up arrow, Down arrow, Left arrow, or Right arrow to play a note. [/*]
[*]Hold 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 to play a flute song from Skyrim
[/*]
[/list][list][*]Press space to exit.
[/*]
[*]Tap for a short sound, or hold for a longer sound.
[/*]
[*]You will have to attack or jump or something to get out of the idle animation. [/*]
[/list]
[center]@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
[b]How to Play the Lute[/b]
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@[/center][list][*]The chords included: Am, A, A#, Bm, C, Dm, D, E, F, F#, Gm, G[/*]
[*]You must press left arrow + Base note to play minor, right arrow + Base note to play sharp, simply hold to play  major
[/*]
[*]Hold 1, 2, 3, or 4 to play a lute song from Skyrim[/*]
[*]Press space to exit[/*]
[*](I like to try to play with other bard[size=2]s)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3][size=2]
[/size][/size][center][size=3][size=2]%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%[/size]
[size=2][b]How to Play the Drums[/b]
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%[/size][/size][/center]
[list][*]Hold 1, 2, or 3 to play a drum song from Skyrim[/*]
[*]Space to exit
[/*]
[/list]

All of the chords included for the lute are enough to play at least Ragnar the Red, and Age of Oppression/Aggression. If there is more demand I can add more chords.

This mod was initially for my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30895/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D30895&pUp=1]Majora's Mask mod[/url]. You will notice that the flute sounds are ocarina sounds... I would like to make it so you can sing something like Ragnar the Red, but I can't get at those files. If i can get those files I'd like to make a skill challenge game where you try to play while you sing, the more chords you get right the more exp you get. But alas, I cannot find them.

Again, YOU NEED SKSE OR IT WILL NOT WORK!

Also If you're lazy and don't feel like crafting an instrument, they are somewhere in the Bard's tower in Solitude ;)

Enjoy!

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Update 8/27/2014
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Added Lute
Added Drum
Added Skyrim Flute songs

+++++++++++++++++++
Update 8/26/2014
+++++++++++++++++++
Fixed "bug" where a flute would appear below you
Now the longer you press the key, the longer the note will play
Reduced pop sound when switching notes
